name: Halloween Drops - Match three puzzle
description:
Halloween Drops begins as a simple match three
board game and gradually increases difficulties
as obstacles are added and level objectives becomes
more challenging.

* Introducing the bomb obstacle.
* 300 levels over five difficulty modes including relaxed no timer special.
* Multiple objectives,challenges and obstacles
* 15 Dazzling power up combinations
* Each level presents you with unique Objectives and Challenges.
* Obstacles mixed with unique level board shapes will keep you swiping and matching for more.
* Create powerful chained power up cascades to level up!
* No in-app purchase, one time payment for the whole gaming experience.
* Hints/Music/Banners can be disabled.

----------------------------------------------------------
There are six possible objectives on each level.
1. Score quota
2. Removing dark pulps
3. Bringing down spider(s).
4. Removing Web(s)
5. Removing Bat(s)
6. Consume the Bone frame.

----------------------------------------------------------
There are two possible challenges on each level.
1. Complete the objective before time runs out.
2. Complete the objective before you ran out of swaps.

----------------------------------------------------------
Obstacles.

1. Broom / Crate: These items can not be moved, can only
be cleared if an adjacent match item is cleared or if a
halloween bag or a double halloween item power up is triggered.
A crate leaves a level three dark pulp.

2. Webbed item: An item behind a web can not be swapped.
Can only be removed by matching the halloween item behind the web
with two other halloween items of the same type, or if it's in the
path of a triggered power up chain.

----------------------------------------------------------
Objectives.

1. Score quota - You need to reach a certain score in order to
level up.
2. Remove dark pulps.
Dark pulps are removed be clearing the halloween item ontop of the
dark pulp. There are three levels of dark pulps. The darkest
pulp needs to be removed three times, which means you need
to clear three halloween items ontop of that dark pulp.
3. Bring down spider(s) to the bottom of the game board.
4. Free the webbed halloween item.
5. Remove all bat(s).
6. Consume the bone framed halloween item.

----------------------------------------------------------
A vaulted halloween item when opened reveals a bone frame.
A vaulted item can only be opened by matching and clearing
all the keyed halloween items.
----------------------------------------------------------
Bat(s) are not switchable

You need to match an adjacent item around the
bat to change its phase

In order to remove a bat, the bats needs to
cycle to all the phases, from winged convered bat to
open winged bat.

All bats(s) needs to be removed in order to
level up.

----------------------------------------------------------
Bomb halloween item
A bomb is represented by a dynamite with a timer.
The timer
shows the number of seconds before
the bomb goes off.
When the bomb explodes
the halloween item will be replaced with an obstacle.

To defuse the bomb, you need to match the bomb
halloween item with two
or more halloween items
of the same type or a power up chain clears
it
before seconds run out.

----------------------------------------------------------

Matching 4 or more halloween items rewards the player
with a power up.

There are three power ups.

1. Halloween bag (horizontal and vertical).
2. Double halloween item.
3. Black jack o lantern.

----------------------------------------------------------
Mystery items.

Mystery items are represented by flasks.
Mystery items are unraveled by matching the flask liquid's color
with the item color. Mystery items could be power ups or an
obstacle - making the level easier or harder it's up to your
luck

----------------------------------------------------------
Auto hints can be disabled/enabled
Banners can be disabled/enabled
Music and sound can be disabled/enabled
